pages.text: The Moonstone Grow Lamp allows $(l:resources/jade_vines)Jade Vines$() to be grown in places where they can't access natural moonlight. Placing Moonstone Grow Lamp directly above a $(l:resources/jade_vines)Jade Vine's$() roots and powering it with redstone will enable the vine to grow.

Placing a block of $(l:resources/shimmerstone)Shimmerstone$() directly on top of the Moonstone Grow Lamp will overcharge it, causing the $(l:resources/jade_vines)Jade Vine$() beneath to die, as if in sunlight.
